summary: THE CENTER  CONSOLE AND THE AREA AT THE BOTTOM OF THE DRIVER SEAT AS WELL AS THE VENT FOR THE BACKSEAT BECOMES EXTREMELY HEATED DURING DRIVING. IT'S EXTREMELY UNCOMFORTABLE AND SHOULD NOT OPERATE IN THIS MANNER. I'VE TAKEN IT BACK TO THE DEALER AND THEY CLAIM THAT IT HAS SOMETHING TO DO WITH A PIPE BENEATH? THIS SHOULD NOT BE. IF THE AC IS ON HOT AIR IS BLOWING OUT OF THE REAR VENT.
